pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mass-Preserving Spline Functions for Soil Data // A low- dependency implementation of GSIF::mpspline() https://r-forge.r -project.org/scm/viewvc.php/pkg/R/mpspline.R?view=markuprevisio n=240root=gsif, which applies a mass-preserving spline to soil attributes. Splining soil data is a safe way to make continuous down-profile estimates of attributes measured over discrete, often discontinuous depth intervals.
